operationBinding.selectClause: t.tel_comp_id, t.deleted, t.rec_date, t.rec_user, t.tel_comp_name_eng, t.tel_comp_name_geo, t.upd_user, t.our_percent, t.has_calculation, decode(t.has_calculation,1,'დიახ',0,'არა','ყველა') as has_calculation_descr, t.call_price
operationBinding.whereClause: 1 = 1 #if($criteria.tel_comp_name_geo) and t.tel_comp_name_geo like '%'||($criteria.tel_comp_name_geo)||'%' #end #if($criteria.phoneIndex) and t.tel_comp_id in (select tt.tel_comp_id from paata.tel_comps_ind tt where $criteria.phoneIndex between tt.st_ind and end_ind) #end #if($criteria.has_calculation) and t.has_calculation = $criteria.has_calculation #end

operationBinding.selectClause: t.phone as phonea, '11808' as phoneb, ch.rec_date as charge_date, to_char(ch.rec_date,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') as charge_date1, 60 as duration, ch.price/100 as rate, ch.price/100 as price
operationBinding.whereClause: t.session_id = ch.session_id and trunc(t.start_date) = trunc($criteria.date_param) and trunc(ch.rec_date) = trunc($criteria.date_param) and exists ( select to_number(decode(length(i.st_ind),7,'32'||i.st_ind,i.st_ind)), to_number(decode(length(i.end_ind),7,'32'||i.st_ind,i.end_ind)) from paata.tel_comps tc inner join paata.tel_comps_ind i on i.tel_comp_id = tc.tel_comp_id where tc.tel_comp_id = $criteria.tel_comp_id and to_number(t.phone) >= to_number(decode(length(i.st_ind),7,'32'||i.st_ind,i.st_ind)) and to_number(t.phone) <= to_number(decode(length(i.end_ind),7,'32'||i.end_ind,i.end_ind)) ) and paata.getcontractorpricenew(t.phone)=-999999999 and t.phone like '322%'
